name: procreative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with or related to producing young animals or babies: Sex of course has a procreative function. It was argued that the purpose of marriage laws is to regulate procreative conduct. See
procreate
More examplesFewer examplesWomen should be able to exercise procreative autonomy, asserting control over if and when they have children. Their seven-passenger car shows off their wealth, status and procreative ambitions.There are good biological reasons for a woman's procreative career to end.
